Thaddeus.description: Whenever the target of your Shield of Faith is hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes rad spell dmg equal to triple your bonus outgoing healing
The bonus AC for upcasting your Shield of Faith is increased by 2. Additionally, it needs 2 fewer slot levels per upcast bonus.
The Healer feat's heal action now has a range of 10'.
After 5th level, the Healer feat's heal action scales in die count every 5 levels instead of 6.

Zacharias.description: Your Magic Missile base force damage is converted to necrotic damage, and if all darts target the same creature, you heal 2 HP.
Whenever you cast a cantrip as an action, you may also cast False Life as part of the same action.
Zacharias.upgrade: false life as a bonus action -> free action/4

Zacharias.description: Whenever your False Life spell ends, you only lose half of its remaining temporary hit points, which last until long rest. Additionally, your False Life grants 3 additional temporary hit points.
Your False Life is always upcast 1 level.

Siggusmondo.description: The first time in a turn a creature fails a saving throw from you, you may trigger your Gathered Swarm.
The Summoned Minion from your Summoner feat has +1 AB
The Summoned Minion from your Summoner feat has +5 max HP

Vehemir.description: Your Speak with Animals now lasts 8 hours
Allies can Help you with animal handling checks you make with beasts you are communicating with via Speak with Animals
Vehemir.upgrade: +4 to these Helped animal handling checks/1

Vehemir.description: The Flesh Rot disease from your Contagion now causes the target to take double damage from all sources instead of becoming vulnerable
Vehemir.upgrade: creatures affected by your flesh rot have +1 dmg taken/1

Vehemir.description: You can now cast Contagion in place of one of your attacks in the Attack action instead of as an action
The Rattling Cough disease from your Contagion now grants -3 with Dexterity-related tasks instead of disadvantage. Additionally, they deal -1 damage with DEX-based attacks.
